questions.question: What is the verdict and damages, if awarded?
questions.description: (Same, less, greater than the damages sought?)

questions.question: Did the judge make a statement?
questions.description: Did it deviate from assessor's findings?

questions.question: Give a summary of the allegations by plaintiff?
What was the key testimony and attorney/advocate's main points?
For how long did the court deliberate before judgement?
Are there any appeals or motions?
Contact details of people you've interviewed
